Peter Ljungberg

Peter Ljungberg was born Jöns Peter Ljungberg on the 20th of October, 1817 to Johannes Ljungberg and Ingar Jonsdotter in Roslätt Gård, Svedala parish in Malmöhus county (1A). Peter lived in Roslätt with his family until his father died on the 29th of June, 1829 (1D). By 1830 he was living on his own in Roslätt (1E). He stayed in Roslätt until 1841 when he moved to Svedala No. 20 where he stayed for a year before moving to Torupshus in Bara parish (1G, 1H, 1I, 1J). In Torupshus he met Boel Andersdotter and the two married on the 15th of October, 1847 (2). A a year later, thir daughter, Johanna Ljungberg was born on the 23rd of April, 1848. Peter died six years later on the 29th of January, 1855 (1M, 4). He was only 38 years old.

Biography

Peter Ljungberg was born Jöns Peter Ljungberg on the 20th of October, 1817 to Johannes Ljungberg and Ingar Jonsdotter in Roslätt Gård, Svedala parish in Malmöhus county (1A). Peter lived in Roslätt with his family until his father died on the 29th of June, 1829 (1D). By 1830 he was living on his own in Roslätt (1E). He stayed in Roslätt until 1841 when he moved to Svedala No. 20 where he stayed for a year before moving to Torupshus in Bara parish (1G, 1H, 1I, 1J). In Torupshus he met Boel Andersdotter and the two married on the 15th of October, 1847 (2). A a year later, thir daughter, Johanna Ljungberg was born on the 23rd of April, 1848. Peter died six years later on the 29th of January, 1855 (1M, 4). He was only 38 years old.
